body.name: HUO JI Gaming Keyboard USB Wired with Rainbow LED Backlit, Quiet Floating Keys, Mechanical Feeling, Spill Resistant, Ergonomic for Xbox, PS Series, Desktop, Computer, PC, Purple Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Professional Gaming Keyboard. Double shot injection keycaps, the letter of characters never fade. Anti-sweat, prevents keycap damage, enhanced durability, and tactile feedback. Thick and firm base plate, long service life. Quality ABS construction make it more solid and reliable.

Colorful Illuminated Keyboard. Rainbow color lighting backlit modes, breathing. It can be great for playing the game at night even without light. You can also adjust the brightness of the backlit according to your preference. Light can be turned off.

104 Keys Standard Keyboard. 12 multi media keys combinations, 26 keys non-conflict, strengthened space key. 12 combinations of multimedia keys facilitate the operation of your work or game and improve efficiency. Ergonomic design, ergonomics Arc keycap, smooth lines, comfortable feeling, and anti-fatigue. Perfect backlit gaming keyboard for gaming and office

High-Quality Floating Keyboard. 2 angle feet on the back of the keyboard can adjust the keyboard height. All "core" water-resistant, triple protection design. Water-resistant keyboard prevents damage from spilled drinks or coffee. Removable keycaps makes clean easier

Wide Compatibility and Ergonomic design. Compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows XP, Windows VISTA, Mac OS, etc. Ergonomic design: the stepped keycap makes it sleek and thearc and slope fit your hands easily to prevent fatigue.
body.description: 2-in-1 keyboards have two different usage scenarios - office working and gaming. Fantastic mechanical feeling gaming keyboard, perfect for whatever battles you might face. High Performance This keyboard adopts liquid silicone conductive film which has good resilience. Adjust backlit gaming keyboard Light function adjustment: 1. Led=Turn on/off keyboard backlight 2.FN+Page UP/Down=Brightness increasing/decreasing 3.FN+(+/-)=Increase/Decrease backlit breathing frequency 4.FN+Home/Led=7 colors backlit breathing The colorful rainbow Backlit can bring you into a great gaming Keyboard atmosphere. Comfortable keyboard perfect for gaming and office Ergonomics arc keycap, smooth lines, give you a comfortable feeling and anti-fatigue when you gaming or typing. 2 folding stands keep your hands in a more comfortable typing position, which will improve your typing speed, accuracy, effectively relieve your finger fatigue & ensure all-day comfort. Will bring you a comfortable typing feeling & stable clicking touch for an amazing gaming experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this for my home office and I love it so far. I’m currently using this as my backup keyboard, but I can say that in terms of comfort, typing on this is great and the led colors are really cute. I also like that you can turn off and on the led when it’s convenient for you. HOWEVER, I will say, I believe this is advertised as a quiet keyboard. I actually prefer loud keyboards when I’m working, it’s something about the sound that helps me focus, so I was worried about how productive I would be working with a quiet keyboard but this is not quiet. I actually really enjoyed working with this Because it’s pretty loud. I do have a typewriter keyboard and that is much louder than this one but this should not be advertised as a quiet keyboard. I did record a little sound example so you can see for yourself if this is quiet enough for you. I’ve worked on keyboards that were much much quieter than this btw. If the silent keyboard is what your looking for then this is not it, but if the noise level is not an issue for you then I recommend getting this because the clicking sounds are really nice to listen to and the keyboard is cute and comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and fun
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard is great! It’s old fashioned style while not being too hard to type on. The lights are vibrant and fun. Definitely worth the money because it’s quiet and comfortable like a really expensive keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The lights are very pretty, I wish they were a bit brighter. The letters written on the keys are a little sloppy? If that makes sense. Overall, a good keyboard, the other reviews are correct in saying the spacebar is pretty loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to replace my old one and I love how bright the Keyes are. Better that what I expected and the quality is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this item for my son. He absolutely loves it. It’s perfect for gaming. Very colorful easy to use and it works perfectly with all his other things. I would definitely buy this product again if he needed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I love my keyboad it’s so pretty just like the picture

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great price, some annoying key layout differences
reviews.reviewText: Great price point, but the backslash and Enter keys are not located out in the standard positions, which I have found to be really annoying as it causes typing errors and doesn't align to other keyboards, which messes with my typing muscle memory. Also the font on the keys is oddly cut off in places and slightly difficult to read, which is minor, but still another negative aspect.It's not worth a return for me at this point, but I probably wouldn't have ordered it if I realized it was like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully soft RGB keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Pros: RGB lights are soft instead of blinding, easy to adjust brightness, satisfying clicky sound from keys*, all keys responsiveCons: Text on some keys hard to read - not an issue on the main keys but worse on keys with full words on them, it can be a bit hard to get used to the unusual enter key shape (it's like the kind commonly found on cash registers instead)*: I know it's advertized as having silent keys, but I like tactile keys with satisfying clickiness so when I saw some reviews here complaining about the keys not being silent I checked a few of the video reviews and decided to get it. So while the click-clacks are a big yes for me, they might not be for everyone.

Estoy realmente enamorada de este teclado, es preciosísimo. Me fascinó el color y las luces LED arcoíris. Es un poco ruidoso, pero personalmente me fascina. No le doy 5 estrellas solo porque venía con una tecla volteada jajaja, pero nada que no se pueda solucionar.

reviews.reviewerName: Muy bonito!! Me encantóMuy bonito!! Me encantó
reviews.reviewText: Calidad acorde al precio. No es lo mejor pero para ser tan accesible me parece genial!! Ninguna queja con las luces led, se ven hermosas

reviews.reviewTitle: Gaming Tastatur. Wirklich nur zum Spielen.
reviews.reviewText: Die Tastatur wurde in der versprochenen Lieferzeit geliefert. Die Verpackung war ordentlich und war frei von Beschädigungen. So weit so gut.Die Tasten sind wirklich sehr leichtgängig und klemmen nicht. Als stöhrend stellte sich das Licht der linken Tastaturseite heraus. Wirke bei mir sehr stöhrend. Leider war kein Infomaterial beigepackt >> Wie mindere ich die Leuchtkraft << Deshalb ging die Tastatur zurück.

I'm not too keen on the cheap plastic casing and I think it makes it a bit expensive for what it is but apart from that it is really nice to type on, makes a pleasing click clack sound with the keys, very easy to operate and led colours are bright. There is not a lot of subtly with the dimming or brightening of the keys but its not a critical concern. I dont use it for gaming so how good it is for that I dont know. But as a pretty substitute for a standard typing keyboard at a sensible price its two thumbs up. I would have preferred more packaging, neighborhood doesn't need to know I'm buying a keyboard. Was delivered on time with no fuss. Thanks.
Me encantaron los colores pastel de este teclado. Las luces igual son lindas, se ven suaves a diferencia de otros teclados que he visto.
